titleStmt.title: The crafty maids approbation. Wherein she shows either black or brown, tis mony makes them straight go down, when pritty girls that gold has none, their fortunes is still to lye alone. To the tune of, A fig for France.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, & T. Passinger.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow Library.
